data EndToEndLog
  • = NodeStarted {
    • nodeId :: Int
    }
  • | SentMessage {
    • nodeId :: Int
    • message :: Value
    }
  • | StartWaiting {
    • nodeIds :: [Int]
    • messages :: [Value]
    }
  • | ReceivedMessage {
    • nodeId :: Int
    • message :: Value
    }
  • | EndWaiting {
    • nodeId :: Int
    }
  • | FromCardanoNode NodeLog
  • | FromFaucet FaucetLog
  • | StartingFunds {
    • actor :: String
    • fuelUTxO :: UTxO
    • otherUTxO :: UTxO
    }
  • | RefueledFunds {
    • actor :: String
    • refuelingAmount :: Lovelace
    • fuelUTxO :: UTxO
    }
  • | RemainingFunds {
    • actor :: String
    • fuelUTxO :: UTxO
    • otherUTxO :: UTxO
    }
  • | PublishedHydraScriptsAt {
    • hydraScriptsTxId :: TxId
    }
  • | UsingHydraScriptsAt {
    • hydraScriptsTxId :: TxId
    }
